name: Bouncy Brawl (Joshhyyy)
description:
In this game you have one goal. Beat Your Friends ! Thats it ! 
Sounds easy right ? Well Prove it ! 
You all have 3 lives To prove who is the best ! 

*Requires 4 gamepads (and 4 players)*

Credits:

Joshua Couchman - Lead Programmer

Amberlea Hoare-Foote - Background Artist 

Oscar - Character Artist

Matthew Fuller - Producer
